snippet.title: The Hayseed Knight Full Release Trailer - Animation & Gameplay
snippet.description:
After 7 years in the making, the full version of my solo project, The Hayseed Knight was released back on February 29th! 

Back then, I was so stressed out to release he game on its own that I didn't have time to create a trailer that reflected the game in full. Now, I'm finally ready to update all my socials with my current name, Maxi Molina, and I wanted to release a more complete trailer to celebrate it!

The Hayseed Knight is a fully voice-acted and animated visual novel about a buck failing to become a knight, that sits on a unique position between animation and games! 

Filled with mystery, comedy and romance driven by a wonderful cast of charismatic characters, you're sure to find something you'll love as much as I loved making it.

Get the game on steam or itch.io!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1332990/The_Hayseed_Knight
https://maximjdev.itch.io/the-hayseed-knight

Launch Trailer Credits:

Editing:
Maxi Molina and Benjamin Beziat

Animation: 
Rough Animation:
Piti Yindee, with Mookie Tamara, Patt Jewanarom and Sandra "Maxi" Molina
Clean Up:
Piti Yindee
Compositing:
Maxi Molina
Backgrounds:
Maxi Molina

Music:
Saad Ali: "Ader's Theme"
TURKU Nomads of the Silk Road: "Rampi Rampi"
